name: Strawberry Basil Lemonade
preparation:
In a double Old Fashioned glass, muddle the strawberry and basil leaves in a double Old Fashioned glass.
Fill with ice and set aside.
Add the gin and lemonade into a shaker with ice and shake.
Strain into the prepared glass.
Top with a splash of club soda.
Garnish with a strawberry slice and basil leaf.
